text: Kharian railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Kharianin Kharian Tehsil of Gujrat District, Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * Kharian * Kharian Tehsil * Gujrat District ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Gujrat District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
